failed: These credentials do not match our records.
throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.
not_verified: Your email address is not verified.

email.not_found: We can't find a user with that email address.
email.not_verified: Your email address is not verified.

login_not_allowed: You are not allowed to login.
something_went_wrong: We're sorry, something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
inactive_device: Your device token is not activated.Please contact our support team.
invalid_device: Access Denied: You are trying to login using a different device. Please use your valid device.
account_created_verify_email: Account successfully created. Please verify your email.
verification_code_sent: We sent a verification code. Please check your phone number.
change_request_verified: Successfully changed, request verified! After approval, you can log in with your new device token.
device_not_found: Device not found in our system. Please check your device information.
not_real_device: Please install our app on your smartphone, not on an emulator. Thanks!
sms_limit_reached: You have reached the maximum number of OTP requests allowed. Please try again after :time hours.
